hours_text:
# Visit Gallery One

_[View the full video.](https://www.gallery-one.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/GALLERYONE_SHORTCOMMERCIAL_HORIZONTAL_FINALCUT01.mp4)_

[ ](https://www.gallery-one.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/20230812_121353-scaled.jpg)

[ ](https://www.gallery-one.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/20230812_121722-scaled.jpg)

[ ](https://www.gallery-one.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/20230812_121256-scaled.jpg)

#### [Click here for a virtual tour of Gallery One. ](https://www.gallery-one.org/vrtour)

### Historic Ellensburg Washington

Located in the historic Stewart building in beautiful downtown Ellensburg, Gallery One Visual Arts Center is the focal point for artists, art patrons, students, community members, and tourists to interact with the visual arts.

Ellensburg is in the heart of the state of Washington. Easy access to the freeway makes a great stop for travelers. Kittitas Valley is one of the most beautiful valleys in the state and is surrounded by mountain peaks and hills. Ellensburg is the home of Central Washington University which also offers a wide variety of speakers, music venues, poetry and book reviews, and cultural experiences.

### Location

Ellensburg is located in the middle of the state of Washington, just off I-90,  
making it an ideal destination no matter where you are coming from!

**408 North Pearl Street, Ellensburg WA 98926**  
**509-925-2670**

#### Tue-Fri 11-5pm  
Sat 10am-4pm  
Sun 12-4pm  
Closed Mondays

### Admission
